item.title: Chat Function Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
[Low] - Chat Maintenance Scheduled

Summary: Chat function maintenance scheduled for November 24, 2023, at 01:30 UTC. Potential intermittent availability during the 1-hour window. No impact on email or portal support.

Nov 23, 18:30 PST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 23, 17:30 PST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 20, 15:04 PST
Scheduled - Our chat function will be undergoing maintenance on November 24, 2023, starting at 01:30 UTC. There will be the potential for intermittent chat availability during this planned 1-hour window. Support by email or portal will not be impacted.

item.title: Chat support not available.
item.content:encoded:
Nov 8, 19:38 PST
Resolved - Chat support has been stable since the closure of the third-party maintenance window. This incident is now resolved.

Nov 8, 18:36 PST
Monitoring - The third-party maintenance window is now complete, and chat support is operational.

Nov 8, 18:13 PST
Identified - Our third-party service provider is currently undergoing maintenance. As such, you may experience intermittent access to chat support during this window. Maintenance is expected to be completed at 02:30am UTC.

Nov 8, 17:59 PST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue where the chat bubble is not available in the Kandji admin interface. Email and portal access continue to be available, as per normal.

item.title: Third party support service undergoing scheduled maintenance.
item.content:encoded:
Nov 8, 17:54 PST
Completed - This was classified as maintenance in error.

Nov 8, 17:46 PST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 8, 17:45 PST
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Nov 8, 17:44 PST
Scheduled - Our third party support service will be undergoing maintenance during this period. As a result, chat may experience intermittent disruptions for a few minutes during this period. If impacted please submit your support requests via our Support Portal, https://support.kandji.io or via email, support@kandji.io

Please see the third party's status page for further information: https://status.freshchat.com/

item.title: User authentication
item.content:encoded:
Nov 7, 16:20 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved. If you continue to experience problems, please open a ticket with our support team.

Nov 7, 15:45 PST
Monitoring - Authentication services have returned to normal and we are monitoring the results. We will post an update as soon as we can confirm the issue has been fully resolved.

Nov 7, 14:54 PST
Investigating - We are investigating a reported issue with third-party user authentication services. This may result in the inability to sign in for some customers. We will post an update as more information becomes available.

item.title: User authentication
item.content:encoded:
Nov 7, 07:42 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved. If you continue to experience problems, please open a ticket with our support team.

Nov 7, 07:03 PST
Monitoring - Third-party user authentication services are reportedly operational and we are monitoring the results. We will post an update as soon as we can confirm the issue has been fully resolved.

Nov 7, 06:29 PST
Investigating - We are investigating a reported issue with third-party user authentication services. This may result in the inability to sign in for some customers. We will post an update as more information becomes available.

item.title: Chat-based support currently experiencing issues
item.content:encoded:
Nov 3, 07:11 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved. If you continue to experience problems with chat in the Kandji Web App, please open a ticket in the support portal at https://support.kandji.io.

Nov 3, 06:04 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented, and we are monitoring the results. We will post an update as soon as we can confirm the issue has been fully resolved.

Nov 3, 03:23 PDT
Identified - We have identified the issue with our service provider. Please follow this link for direct updates on the service.

https://status.freshchat.com/incident/402154

Nov 3, 03:05 PDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Nov 3, 03:03 PDT
Investigating - We are investigating a reported issue with chat-based support. This may result in the inability to conduct support via chat for some customers. We will post an update as more information becomes available. Please email support@kandji.io for support if you are experiencing issues with chat.

item.title: User Authentication
item.content:encoded:
Oct 30, 15:05 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved. If you continue to experience problems, please open a ticket with our support team.

Oct 30, 13:48 PDT
Monitoring - Third-party user authentication services are reportedly operational and we are monitoring the results. We will post an update as soon as we can confirm the issue has been fully resolved.

Oct 30, 13:36 PDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Oct 30, 13:20 PDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Oct 30, 13:19 PDT
Investigating - We are investigating a reported issue with third-party user authentication services. This may result in the inability to sign in for some customers. We will post an update as more information becomes available.

Sep 29, 12:00 PDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Scheduled - We will be performing planned maintenance on September 29, 2023, starting at 19:00 UTC. Customers with instances hosted in the EU can expect intermittent service for a planned 1-hour window.

item.title: Access to Web App for EU instances
item.content:encoded:
Aug 25, 08:54 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 25, 07:06 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. We will post an update as soon as we can confirm the issue has been fully resolved.

Aug 25, 06:44 PDT
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented. Customers may continue to experience impacted Web App functionality for EU instances. We will post an update as soon as additional information is available.

Aug 25, 06:37 PDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Aug 25, 03:58 PDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Aug 25, 03:56 PDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Aug 25, 03:52 PDT
Investigating - We are investigating a reported issue with access to the EU instances. This may result in an inability to reach the Web App for some customers. We will post an update as more information becomes available.

item.title: Access to the Kandji Web App
item.content:encoded:
Aug 9, 14:50 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved. If you continue to experience problems, please open a ticket with our support team.

Aug 9, 13:42 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented, and we are monitoring the results. We will post an update as soon as we can confirm the issue has been fully resolved.

Aug 9, 12:56 PDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate enrollment and agent communication issues.

Aug 9, 12:09 PDT
Investigating - We are investigating a reported issue with the Kandji Web App failing to load for a small amount of customers. We will post an update as more information becomes available.

item.title: Access to Kandji
item.content:encoded:
Nov 17, 09:35 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved. If you experience any further problems, please open a ticket with our support team.

Nov 17, 07:45 PST
Monitoring - We are no longer encountering 404 errors when accessing the Kandji Web App or from clients attempting to connect. We will post an update once we have confirmed that the issue has been fully resolved.

Nov 17, 07:07 PST
Identified - The issue has been identified, and a fix is being implemented. Customers may continue to experience impacted functionality. We will post an update as soon as additional information is available.

Nov 17, 06:56 PST
Investigating - We are investigating a reported issue with access to Kandji. This may result in an inability to connect for some customers. We will post an update as more information becomes available.

item.title: Planned Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
Nov 16, 23:00 PST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 16, 21:00 PST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 31, 15:32 PDT
Scheduled - We will be performing planned maintenance on November 17, 2022, at 5:00 UTC. Customers can expect intermittent service for a planned 2-hour window.

item.title: Investigating 404 errors
item.content:encoded:
Nov 15, 03:16 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved. If you experience any future problems, please open a ticket with our support team.

Nov 15, 02:23 PST
Monitoring - We are no longer seeing 404 errors or access issues when accessing the Kandji Web App. We will post an update once we have confirmed the issue has been fully resolved.

Nov 15, 01:31 PST
Update - We are now seeing loading and 404 issues as well as reports of access issues reduced to intermittent. Further updates to follow.

Nov 15, 00:39 PST
Update - We are investigating further reports of customers' Kandji instances not loading. Further updates will be provided as more information becomes available.

Nov 14, 23:56 PST
Investigating - We are investigating reports of 404 errors when attempting to access the Kandji Web App. We will post an update as more information becomes available.
